ygData.subject: The SK Petition
ygData.msgSnippet: Do you have a link to the EQSS forum that has the actual petition?  I found a thread that is asking for support that turned into a debate, but nothing that
ygData.messageBody:
Do you have a link to the EQSS forum that has the actual
petition? I found a thread that is asking for support
that turned into a debate, but nothing that says vote
yes, station ID, Server, etc. that the coordinator says
are the only things enterable when voting for a
petition. Also, that thread I found the debate in was a
closed thread. Beld was active in it, but no official
votes were tallied that I saw.
Thanks.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
15th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous
